OpenSSL> rsa -in pri.key -noout -modulus
Modulus=C976E12628232F36756A9046EF4366FF74B76DB1209EEE5BBAD322FC68C28E47491354E449A60102140B46726813EFA81D541E5DC636CBDDE7AC7B144D4D25B2AC8FC48C148BE93F46464E23318F17A6A1170797D767FB896109DB602EDD1C42496B1E5BBE268702F424281A192741DBEFAEE5730810E5A65C41EFDD4A7941B3
